title: David Lammy – 2021 Comments on Crown Court Backlogs
author: admin
summary: The comments made by David Lammy, the Shadow Justice Secretary, on 30 September 2021.
content:
11 years of Conservative cuts and the closure of 295 courts since 2010 has led to a record-breaking Crown Court backlog.
